embed.title: Exp Point
embed.description: EXP points are gained when you acquire a new troops, level up a hero, or complete an Exp quest

fields.name: How do I gain EXP points?
fields.value:
You gain Exp points when you
• level up a hero,
• acquire a new troops from the shop,
• acquire a new troops from super cards,
• acquire a new troops from the troops box,
• acquire a new troops from an event, or
• acquire a new troops from the mail box, or
• complete an Exp quest
